MessageTypes.label: Lateral mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number that indicates lateral mode: : 0 none, 1 ROL, 2 HDG, 3 NAV, 4 APR, 5 REV

MessageTypes.label: Vertical mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating vertical mode: 0 nothing 1 ALT, 2 VS, 3 GS

MessageTypes.label: Right Block Data
MessageTypes.description: $ is Number to display in the right block. (the alt, vs, baro value)

MessageTypes.label: Lateral Arm mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is number indicating active lateral arm: 0 none, 1 NAV, 2 APR, 3 REV 4 GS

MessageTypes.label: Vertical Arm Mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is number indicating vertical arm mode: ALT

MessageTypes.label: Trim indicator
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating the trim indicator: 0 none, 1 up, 2 down

MessageTypes.label: Alert Indicator
MessageTypes.description: $ is whether the Alert indicator is lit. 0 off, 1 on

MessageTypes.label: Baro Mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating if we are in Baro mode: 0 no, 1 HPA, 2 inHg

MessageTypes.label: Self Test mode
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating we are in self test mode. 0 no, 1 yes

MessageTypes.label: Baro mode blinking
MessageTypes.description: $ is a number indicating the baro mode is blinking. 0 no, 1 yes

MessageTypes.label: Show VS
MessageTypes.description: 1 if VS is temporarily displayed, else 0

MessageTypes.label: AP is Powered
MessageTypes.description: 1 if the KAP140 has power, 0 if the unit is switched completely off
